sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { Redirect, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Table, Button, Form, Image, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' const GetAll = () => { const [data, setData] = React.useState([]) const [editIndex, setEditIndex] = React.useState(null) const { products } = useSelector((state) => { return { products: state.product.products } }) const dispatch = useDispatch(); React.useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:2000/admin/getall`) .then(res => (setData(res.data))) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, [data]) const pricesort = () => { products.sort((a,b) => b.price - a.price) } const renderTable = () => { return data.map((item, index) => { return ( index === editIndex ? {index + 1} {item.total_stock} pcs : {index + 1} {item.name} {item.category} IDR {item.price.toLocaleString()} {item.total_stock} pcs ) }) } return (
General Warehouse Jakarta Warehouse Medan Warehouse Surabaya
{renderTable()}
No Name Image Category Price Total Stock Action
) } export default GetAll
